title: Person of Interest: Fusco VS Simmons
author: POI Fights
comment: Between Reese and fusco, fusco was more appropriate to kick Simmon’s ass,
Props to Fusco standing up for his partner to be better cop good father
This scene tears me up everytime I watched it. Best character development ever.😥😭😥😭😥😭😥😭
Two epic Fusco scenes, two epic Fusco fights one episode after the other!

'Patrick Simmons, you're under arrest.’



Best line to hear after seasons of him slipping away all the time.
description: Fight Scene from S03 X 10: The Devil's Share
